Wardrobes

A superb range of options from Colour-Back glass, Mirror, Vinyl Coated Gyprock, and Timber grain. Keep it simple with Vinyl or colour-back glass or make a statement with the popular Mirror-line Robes.

High quality Australian made

All our robe doors are safety backed 4mm glass and made to measure. Manufactured in our factory with high quality Dias metal extrusions.

Any size space can be measured to an existing opening for your robe doors. Triple track can be added for larger openings.

Ask us about our internal wardrobe shelving options.

Types

Colour-back Glass
Choose from a range of colours or custom painted
Mirror
Silver bronze or grey mirror helps open up a smaller space.
Vinyl
A low cost budget option with a clean simple look. Vinyl are unique, stylish and durable.
Premium Vinyl
Make a statement, choose colours and styles to decorate and match your dÃ©cor.

Styles

Mirrorline
Micro-framed edge to give a frameless look, modern look. Triple track available.
Slimline
This look can be achieved on all the above options. The wheels are in the center of the bottom rail. Triple track available.
